resources.string: You cannot create simple event with today date or before…
You cannot create appointment before current time

Vedroid Events is Birthdays and Events remainder app

 Thanks for https://friendlystock.com website. Some of their free clipart images were used.


And special thanks to Lena, my beautiful wife!
